description: Lists the financial properties of one or several accounts.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: SELF lists the properties of the executing account, SUBUSER lists the properties for all subuser accounts
If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Shows in addition the financial properties at the given date
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
ALL - Consider all account balances. This is the defaultAR - Only consider negative account balancesAP - Only consider positive account balances
Only allowed parameter is CURRENCYUSERID which will sort the output by the account's currency fist and then by the user ID
Do not show the properties of the subuser accounts listed here
